statements: DELETE FROM IOCs WHERE ioc_type = 'IP' AND detected_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM IOCs WHERE ioc_id = 100 AND ioc_type = 'IP'
DELETE FROM IOCs WHERE type = 'Phishing' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM IOCs WHERE type = 'Malware' AND indicator = 'example.com';
DELETE FROM Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Malware' AND is_resolved = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM investigations WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM threats WHERE threat_level = 'High' AND detection_date < '2022-01-01';
